    • org.openqa.selenium.safari中Capabilities的使用

      参数类型为Capabilities的org.openqa.selenium.safari中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static SafariOptions SafariOptions.fromCapabilities(Capabilities capabilities)
      Construct a SafariOptions instance from given capabilites.
      参数类型为Capabilities的org.openqa.selenium.safari中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      SafariDriver(Capabilities desiredCapabilities)
      Converts the specified DesiredCapabilities to a SafariOptions instance and initializes a new SafariDriver using these options.
